Title: Last Christmas
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Donald Todd, Aurin Squire (story editor), Kay Oyegun (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: At Christmas, Jack and Rebecca are unexpectedly reunited with an old friend, while Kevin, Randall and Kate face different holiday dramas.
